sentences.en: Concentration is distinct from dehydration, based on differences in final water content and product characteristics.
sentences.cn: 由于最终的水分含量和产品特性不同，浓缩与脱水是不同的。

sentences.en: Dehydration in hydraulic presses is the most general method now in use.
sentences.cn: 在水压机中驱水是目前通用的方法.

sentences.en: Dehydration rate increases with the increasing of additive concentration, and then decreases.
sentences.cn: 随着添加剂浓度的增大,凝胶的脱水速率先减小, 后增大.

sentences.en: Dry Mouth Saliva lubricates the mouth, dehydration reduces the amount available.
sentences.cn: 口腔唾液顺利口干 、 脱水量可削减.

sentences.en: Early dehydration – no signs or symptoms.
sentences.cn: 早期脱水——无迹象或无症状。

sentences.en: Give fluid orally or parenterally as necessary to prevent dehydration.
sentences.cn: 必要时,经口或经胃肠道外补给液体,以防止脱水.

sentences.en: He died from severe dehydration.
sentences.cn: 他死于严重脱水.

sentences.en: Literally. Tears not only lubricate our eyeballs and eyelids, they also prevent dehydration of our various mucous membranes.
sentences.cn: 从字面上看，泪水不仅润滑我们的眼球和眼睑，还可以防止各种黏膜脱水。

sentences.en: Occa-sionally hospitalization is required to combat dehydration.
sentences.cn: 有时病人必须住院以防脱水。

sentences.en: The activation energy for dehydration reaction has been calculated by Freeman - Carroll method.
sentences.cn: 采用Freeman-Carroll方法计算了配合物脱水过程的活化能和反应级数.

sentences.en: The dehydration of - activity bread dry yeast could directly influence yeast activity.
sentences.cn: 高活性面包干酵母复水活化的好坏直接影响酵母活性.

sentences.en: The dehydration process leads to fairly extensive decomposition of the product.
sentences.cn: 脱水过程会导致产物相当程度的分解.

sentences.en: The eyes are often retracted from dehydration.
sentences.cn: 眼睛常因脱水而凹陷.

sentences.en: There is no specific treatment for yellow fever, only supportive care to treat dehydration and fever.
sentences.cn: 对黄热病没有特效治疗方法，支持性治疗只是治疗脱水和发热。

sentences.en: Thirst kicks in long before dehydration starts, he added.
sentences.cn: 另外他补充道,早在身体出现脱水现象以前,人就会有口渴的感觉了.

sentences.en: This loss of sodium can cause dehydration and cramping.
sentences.cn: 钠流失会造成脱水和抽筋.

sentences.en: Those other drinks are full of sugar which actually causes dehydration.
sentences.cn: 而实际上那些富含糖分的饮料容易造成脱水。

sentences.en: Trehalose and sucrose maintain the structural organization in anhydrobiotic organisms on dehydration.
sentences.cn: 海藻糖和蔗糖维持了脱水时期脱水生活的生物体的结构组织.

sentences.en: Vegetable is exported after classics quick - freeze or dehydration treatment.
sentences.cn: 蔬菜经速冻或脱水加工后出口.

sentences.en: While the choose of the dehydration agent and catalyst introduced.
sentences.cn: 同时,分别介绍了脱水剂选择和摧化剂选用的研究进展.

words.tran_cn: 使…脱水；使极其口渴；使丧失力量和兴趣等
